features: The information below applies to each unit in the pack
Soothing overnight moisturising cream hydrates & helps reduce redness overnight
Aloe Vera + vitamin E + 6 skin smoothing emollients
description: Product Description We love Oh So soothing Aloe Vera! Its an amazing plant! Containing over 75 actives like vitamins & amino acids and with so many skin benefits we had to use it. So our hydrating night cream will help soothe and reduce redness overnight. Ingredients Water (Aqua), Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Tocopherol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Carica Papaya Fruit Extract, Ceteareth-6, PEG-40 Sorbitan Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Polyacrylamide, Fragrance (Parfum), Butylene Glycol, C13-14 Isoalkane, Laureth-7, Chlorphenesin, Benzyl Benzoate. Safety Warning Use only as directed. If product gets into eyes, rinse with water. See more
